title: Vicky Pattison shares perfect poolside swimsuit photo on Instagram
text:
She's enjoying a relaxing trip to Bali in the company of her mum Caroll.

And Vicky Pattison joked she fell into the water three times in a bid to capture the 'perfect poolside snap' during her trip, sharing the visual evidence of her efforts on Instagram on Thursday.

The reality star, 31, was modelling an animal print swimsuit as she stretched out by the water's edge at her luxurious Bliss Sanctuary for Women getaway - only to tumble in mere moments later.

Oops: Vicky Pattison joked she fell into the water three times in a bid to take the 'perfect poolside snap' in Bali, sharing the visual evidence of her efforts on Instagram on Thursday

Captioning the trio of images, Vicky wrote: 'Oh what we go through to get that perfect poolside snap... I fell off this ledge no less than 3 times tryna bag this beauty... but it was all worth it

'I can’t believe it’s my last day in Bali and tomorrow I’ll be leaving @blisssanctuaryforwomen...

'I am absolutely gutted to be leaving such a beautiful place but I’m excited to get back to London, to my @ercan_ram and our gorgeous home...

'PLUS it’s Halloween next week and I can’t decide if I want to be a unicorn princess or a straight up sl**ty cat... all input appreciated!!!'

There she goes! The reality star, 31, was modelling an animal print swimsuit as she stretched out by the water's edge at her luxurious Bliss Sanctuary for Women getaway - only to tumble in mere moments later

All for the 'gram: Captioning the trio of images, Vicky wrote, 'Oh what we go through to get that perfect poolside snap... I fell off this ledge no less than 3 times tryna bag this beauty... but it was all worth it'

She added: 'Ps check out my chins in picture 2 Pps THANKYOU @mammypatto for having the patience to take these round the pool today- you are getting better I think Oh and ppps my swimsuit is @newlook'.

During her stay at the luxury retreat, the former Geordie Shore star has been taking to the photo-sharing site to address trolling in a lengthy post as she insisted: 'Let them judge you'.

Showing off her surgically-enhanced frame, Vicky posed for pouty selfies while soaking up the sun on padded loungers.

Loving life: During her stay at the luxury retreat, the former Geordie Shore star has been taking to the photo-sharing site non-stop

The reality star even posed topless for a trio of shots of her taken while bathing in a bath of pink rose petals, as she joked that getting the perfect photograph had 'tested her relationship with her mother.'

Appearing make-up free throughout her time away, the television personality did admit to having a spray tan before flying to Bali.

Next to one bikini snap, Vicky explained how she would delete any negative comments left on her photographs, and block trolls as she implored her followers to be mindful on social media.

Let them judge you: Vicky also addressed trolling in a lengthy rant

How it is: Vicky explained how she would delete any negative comments left on her photographs, and block trolls as she implored her followers to be mindful on social media

She wrote: 'Let them judge you. Let them misunderstand you. Let them gossip about you. Their opinions aren't your problem.

'You stay kind, committed to love and free in your authenticity. No matter what they do or say don't you dare ever doubt your worth or the beauty of your truth. Just keep on shining like you do.

'This is just a little post to say that anything remotely negative written on my Instagram will be deleted and you will be blocked (sounds savage right?!!! I'm so dramatic!)

'But seriously, when you're about to write something on someone's page ask yourself this: 'would I say it to their face?!' And if the answer is no... just don't write it.

'It's straight up that simple (mad right?!) My Instagram is a place of warmth, authenticity, humour and positivity- so hate of any kind won't be tolerated.'

Wow! The reality star also posed topless for a trio of shots of her taken while bathing in a bath of pink rose petals

If it’s not on Instagram did it even happen? She joked that getting the perfect photograph had 'tested her relationship with her mother'

Candid: Vicky shared a close-up selfie after leading the set with her her sultry topless snap

Vicky went on to explain that she isn't naturally a positive person, and uses Instagram as a way to uplift her.

She wrote: 'I work hard to be as positive as I am (I'm naturally actually quite a miserable old boot) and some days I genuinely don't feel like it's all sunshine and rainbows.

'And if I come on to social media I want to feel uplifted by the sight of women empowering women, motivational quotes, compliments under selfies, funny memes, people sharing beautiful memories, just genuine love and light.

'I do not want to hear that Barry from Barnsley thinks I've put on weight or that Sharon from stoke reckons I'm too big for my boots now... (nothing against Barry's, Barnsley, Sharon's or stoke there btw guys... I just like an alliteration!).'

Mother, daughter time: Vicky's mother Caroll has flown to Bali with her for some quality time

Instagram versus reality: Vicky shared many 'Instagram versus reality' snaps while in Bali

Soaking it all in: The television personality bathed in a traditional Balinese bath

The Geordie Shore star then expressed her gratitude for her supportive followers, before begging others to be 'mindful.'

She concluded: 'I'm saying this here and honestly across the board I am very lucky to have mostly beautiful followers who practice support and kindness on the regular- for that I am so grateful and I love you all.

'But for the few people who don't seem to grasp the gravity of their words I implore you to be mindful across all social media.

'Kindness and compassion are much for fun to spread than hate and anger. Let those things go and start enjoying the parrrttttyyyyy Debbie downers!!

'Namaste.. (yes I know I'm a joke, I've done yoga for about an hour and I'm already saying 'namaste'- I'm planning on going vegan next and also wearing an anklet.. Bali has claimed me.. LOL).'
description: Vicky Pattison joked she fell into the water three times in a bid to take the 'perfect poolside snap' during her trip to Bali, sharing the visual evidence of her efforts on Instagram on Thursday.
